item.title: 交易商关注季末美国风暴，欧洲天然气进一步上涨
item.description: 欧洲天然气价格在周一跳涨后延续涨势，交易商正在关注一场晚季热带风暴可能会扰乱美国的燃料生产。【原文：European natural gas prices extended gains after a jump on Monday, with traders watching a late-season tropical storm threatening to disrupt fuel production in the US.】

item.title: 宽带公司 "香港宽带 "寻求约 8 亿美元贷款用于再融资
item.description: 据熟悉情况的人士透露，香港宽带服务提供商香港宽频有限公司正在寻求约 62.5 亿港元（8 亿美元）的贷款用于再融资。【原文：Hong Kong broadband service provider HKBN Ltd. is seeking an about HK$6.25 billion ($800 million) loan for refinancing purposes, according to people familiar with the situation.】

item.title: Atos 同意以 2.7 亿欧元将 Worldgrid 部门出售给 Alten
item.description: 陷入困境的法国技术公司 Atos SE 一直在努力避免破产，该公司已同意以 2.7 亿欧元（2.94 亿美元）（包括债务）的价格出售其 Worldgrid 部门。【原文：Atos SE, the troubled French technology company that’s been fighting to avert bankruptcy, has agreed to sell its Worldgrid unit for €270 million ($294 million) including debt.】

item.title: 焦点转向美国大选，欧洲股市交易平稳
item.description: 欧洲股市变化不大，因为交易商的焦点转向了美国大选以及本周晚些时候即将到来的美联储决议。【原文：European stocks were little changed as traders’ focus turns to the US election and with the Federal Reserve decision looming later in the week.】

item.title: 中国市场疲软、工厂重组导致奥迪集团利润下滑
item.description: 由于中国奢侈品消费的减少以及布鲁塞尔工厂的重组拖累了回报率，大众汽车公司旗下以奥迪为首的高端品牌在第三季度勉强实现了营业利润。【原文：Volkswagen AG’s Audi-led premium brands barely eked out an operating profit in the third quarter after waning luxury spending in China and a plant restructuring in Brussels dragged on returns.】

item.title: SEB 交易员对巨幅降息预期反应平淡
item.description: 据 SEB AB 交易员称，瑞典央行很可能在本周加快宽松步伐，他们预计在周四宣布决定后，市场波动将受到限制。【原文：The Riksbank is likely to step up the pace of easing this week, according to SEB AB traders who expect market movements to be limited after the decision is announced on Thursday.】

item.title: 国泰航空有意从 2025 年起订购新远程喷气机
item.description: 国泰航空公司（Cathay Pacific Airways Ltd.）计划从明年起开始新一轮购买远程喷气式飞机的谈判，为未来十年的增长做好准备。【原文：Cathay Pacific Airways Ltd. plans to start a new round of negotiations to buy long-haul jets from next year as the airline looks to position itself for growth in the next decade.】

item.title: AB 食品公司利润大幅增长，推出新的回购计划
item.description: 英国联合食品公司（Associated British Foods Plc）的年度利润大幅增长，该公司表示，在投入成本降低的帮助下，其 Primark 服装连锁店和食品部门的发展势头有望在本财年继续保持。【原文：Associated British Foods Plc’s annual profit jumped and the company said momentum at its Primark clothing chain and food division is expected to continue this fiscal year, helped by easing input costs.】

item.title: 需求疲软，IPhone制造商鸿海10月销售增长放缓
item.description: 苹果公司的主要制造合作伙伴鸿海精密工业股份有限公司（Hon Hai Precision Industry Co.【原文：Apple Inc.’s major manufacturing partner Hon Hai Precision Industry Co. reported its slowest monthly sales growth since February, stoking concerns about demand momentum for both AI infrastructure and iPhones.】

item.title: 雪佛龙据说考虑出售香港加油站业务
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，雪佛龙公司正在考虑出售其在香港的所有加油站，因为潜在投资者对此很感兴趣。【原文：Chevron Corp. is considering a sale of all of its gas stations in Hong Kong amid interest from prospective investors, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 随着扭亏为盈计划的推进，Orsted 下调了全年指导目标
item.description: 丹麦 Orsted A/S 公司略微收窄了全年盈利预测，因为在经历了糟糕的 2023 年之后，公司扭亏为盈的步伐正在加快。【原文：Denmark’s Orsted A/S slightly narrowed its full-year earnings forecast as the work to turn the company around gathers pace after a dreadful 2023.】

item.title: 瑞典 EQT 公司以 14 亿美元现金收购 OEM 国际公司
item.description: 私募股权集团 EQT AB 发起了对 OEM International AB 的竞购，以推动这家瑞典零部件制造商的并购增长。【原文：Private equity group EQT AB unveiled a bid for OEM International AB to drive M&A fueled growth for the Swedish component manufacturer.】

item.title: CVC的FineToday据称将为年底的东京IPO挑选银行
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，日本个人护理用品企业 FineToday Holdings Co.【原文：Japanese personal-care business FineToday Holdings Co. has selected banks for a potential initial public offering that could take place as soon as before the year end, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 维斯塔斯全年利润预计为指导范围的下限
item.description: 维斯塔斯风力系统公司（Vestas Wind Systems A/S）表示，预计全年盈利将在预期范围的下限，这家风力涡轮机制造商正努力在可再生能源领域长期动荡之后安抚投资者。【原文：Vestas Wind Systems A/S said it expects earnings for the full year at the lower end of its expected range as the wind turbine maker seeks to reassure investors after a prolonged period of tumult in the renewable power sector.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市将在一系列财报公布前下挫
美国比特币 ETF 在大选日前遭遇创纪录的资金外流
item.description: 随着市场为大选日做准备，投资于比特币的美国交易所交易基金录得迄今为止最高的单日净流出量。【原文：US exchange-traded funds investing in Bitcoin recorded their highest daily net outflow to date as markets brace for Election Day.】

item.title: 任天堂因 Switch 需求下滑导致利润大幅下降
item.description: 任天堂公司因其老旧的 Switch 游戏机需求放缓，连续第五个季度利润下滑，预计全年利润将出现更大跌幅。【原文：Nintendo Co. forecast a bigger profit decline for the full year after reporting its fifth straight quarterly profit decline on slowing demand for its aging Switch console.】

item.title: 暴风雨淹没农作物后，菲律宾为另一场台风做好准备
item.description: 菲律宾将在短短一个多月内遭受第四场暴风雨的侵袭，今年的农作物损失总额至少达 115 亿比索（约合 1.97 亿美元），而且有可能进一步增加。【原文：The Philippines is set to be drenched by its fourth storm in just over a month, which threatens to add to a growing tally of crop losses that total at least 11.5 billion pesos ($197 million) this year.】

item.title: 中国建筑商凯撒出售香港总部
item.description: 据知情人士透露，中国开发商凯撒集团控股有限公司（Kaisa Group Holdings Ltd.）正在寻求出售其香港总部办公室，这标志着这家拖欠债务的公司为缓解资金压力所做的最新努力。【原文：Chinese developer Kaisa Group Holdings Ltd. is seeking to sell its Hong Kong headquarters office, according to people familiar with the matter, marking the defaulter’s latest effort to ease funding pressure.】

item.title: 沙特财政摇摆不定，阿美公司保持世界最高薪酬水平
item.description: 由于沙特阿拉伯数万亿美元的经济转型计划扩大了预算赤字，尽管利润减少，阿美石油公司仍将季度股息保持在 310 亿美元。【原文：Aramco held its quarterly dividend at $31 billion, despite lower profit, as Saudi Arabia’s multitrillion-dollar economic transformation plans widens the budget deficit.】

item.title: 特朗普交易步入 "阴阳魔界
item.description:
预测市场认为，美国大选结果在周三之后才能揭晓的可能性为三分之一。【原文：

Prediction markets give a one in three chance that election results can’t be called until after Wednesday in the US.

】

item.title: Polymarket 就大选内容向美国社交媒体影响者付费
item.description: 预测投注平台 Polymarket 一直在付钱给美国的社交媒体影响者，让他们在网站上推广选举投注— 尽管它被禁止让国内任何人使用该工具下注，包括周二的总统竞选。【原文：The predictions-betting platform Polymarket has been paying US-based social media influencers to promote election betting on the site — even though it’s barred from letting anyone in the country use the tool to place wagers, including on Tuesday’s presidential race.】

item.title: 融创债务计划旨在将其 20 亿美元的地方债券减半
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国房地产开发商融创中国控股有限公司（Sunac China Holdings Ltd.）正寻求根据拟议的在岸重组计划将其人民币债券削减一半以上。【原文：Chinese property developer Sunac China Holdings Ltd. is looking to cut its yuan-denominated bonds by more than half under a proposed onshore restructuring plan, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 对冲基金二次猜测特朗普胜选 押注美元下跌
item.description: 如果卡马拉-哈里斯（Kamala Harris）赢得总统大选，美元走软将使货币期权受益。【原文：A coin-toss US election is spurring some hedge funds to favor currency options that will gain from a weaker dollar should Kamala Harris win the presidency.】

item.title: 中国的繁文缛节让数十亿美元的交易陷入困境
item.description: 中国监管机构的触角伸得太长，使得世界第二大经济体中的某些公司难以进行交易，导致价值数十亿美元的交易被搁置。【原文：The long reach of Chinese regulators is making it hard for certain companies in the world’s second-biggest economy to carry out transactions, leaving billions of dollars worth of deals on the table.】

item.title: 中国集团被指控在电信攻击中黑客攻击新加坡电信
item.description: 据两位熟悉内情的人士透露，新加坡最大的移动运营商新加坡电信有限公司今年夏天遭到中国国家支持的黑客入侵，这是针对全球电信公司和其他关键基础设施运营商的更广泛行动的一部分。【原文：Singapore Telecommunications Ltd., Singapore’s largest mobile carrier, was breached by Chinese state-sponsored hackers this summer as part of a broader campaign against telecommunications companies and other critical infrastructure operators around the world, according to two people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 香港基金热心行将关闭，向客户返还 16 亿美元
item.description: 总部位于香港的基金管理公司行健资产管理有限公司（Zeal Asset Management Ltd. ）将在 15 年后关闭，并寻求向客户返还至少 16 亿美元。【原文：Hong Kong-based fund manager Zeal Asset Management Ltd. will close after 15 years and seek to return at least $1.6 billion to clients.】

item.title: 中国经济复苏迹象明显，铜价扩大涨幅
item.description: 铜连续第三天上涨，原因是中国经济数据向好，而且人们希望中国政府将推出更多经济支持措施。【原文：Copper rose for a third day on positive Chinese economic data and hopes Beijing will unveil more economic support measures.】

item.title: 消费者削减开支，东南亚数字经济放缓
item.description: 一组研究人员表示，东南亚互联网经济今年的增长速度将创下历史最慢纪录，这凸显了消费需求的疲软，以及推动显示利润而非收入增长的趋势。【原文：Southeast Asia’s internet economy will log its slowest growth on record this year, a group of researchers said, underscoring weakness in consumer demand and a push to show profits instead of revenue gains.】

item.title: 排放新规迫在眉睫，上海推出绿色航运计划
item.description: 上海政府希望将世界上最繁忙的港口改造成绿色航运中心。【原文：The government in Shanghai wants to convert the world’s busiest port into a center for greener shipping.】
